pillars.name: Unparalleled Education
pillars.description: Students are presented with a wide variety of high level courses throughout their four years.

pillars.name: College Collaboration
pillars.description: A partnership with UHart allows our students to get a full taste of the college world.

pillars.name: Extracurricular Excellence
pillars.description: From popcorn club to robotics to track and field, there is something for everyone!

name: University High School of Science and Engineering
announcements: Soccer & Cross Country Practices/Tryouts begin Monday Sept 14th.  If interested, see Coach Silenok in Room 329 for soccer or Coach Brown in Room 321 for Cross Country.

UHART Course Registration Form: https://drive.google.com/open?id=18ElhuxZSmD2wWIG1zgAERXU7D28T3pYO
Please email completed form to your counselor by the posted deadlines.  See your counselor's google classroom for eligibility requirements and deadlines.

warningBox.info:
Starting September 14, 2020:
Freshmen attend in person/virtually every Monday-Friday (Wednesday's half day 11:30 dismissal)
In Person Grade 10-12 attend Monday and Tuesday and virtually Wednesday.
Virtual Students Grades 10-12 attend classes during regular school hours Wednesday, Thursday and Friday.

Virtual sessions begin at 8:10am and follow the normal class period school schedule.

Wednesday Schedule (Virtual 10-12) Grade 9 - 1/2 day with 11:30 dismissal:
Block 1      8:00-8:45
Block 3      8:50-9:35
Block 4      9:40-10:25
Block 5     10:30-11:15
Lunch Break- 11:15-12:15
Block 6      12:20-1:05
Block 7      1:10-1:55
Block 8      2:00-2:40

Monday/Friday Schedule (For In Person and Virtual 9-12):
Block 1     8:10-9:30
Block 2     9:34-9:56
Block 3     10:00-11:52 (with 1/2 hour lunch by class)
Block 4     11:56-1:16
Block 5     1:20-2:40

Tuesday/Thursday Schedule (For In Person and Virtual 9-12): 
Block 6     8:10-10:07
Block 7     10:11- 12:40 (with 1/2 hour lunch by class)
Block 8     12:44-2:40

Questions? Call our main office at 860-695-9020.

lead: Early college high school located on the campus of University of Hartford
